com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.credit

Class AbstractCdsFunction<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.AbstractCalculationFunction<CdsTrade,ScenarioResult<T>>
      • com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.credit.AbstractCdsFunction<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the return type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalculationFunction<CdsTrade>, CalculationSingleFunction<CdsTrade,ScenarioResult<T>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CdsCs01BucketedHazardFunction, CdsCs01BucketedParFunction, CdsCs01ParallelHazardFunction, CdsCs01ParallelParFunction, CdsIr01BucketedParFunction, CdsIr01BucketedZeroFunction, CdsIr01ParallelParFunction, CdsIr01ParallelZeroFunction, CdsJumpToDefaultFunction, CdsParRateFunction, CdsPvFunction, CdsRecovery01Function

    public abstract class AbstractCdsFunction<T>
extends AbstractCalculationFunction<CdsTrade,ScenarioResult<T>>
    Perform calculations on a single CdsTrade for each of a set of scenarios.

    The default reporting currency is determined to be the currency of the fee leg.

      • execute

        public ScenarioResult<T> execute(CdsTrade trade,
                                 CalculationMarketData marketData)
        Description copied from interface: CalculationSingleFunction
        Calculates a value for the target using multiple sets of market data.

        If the calculated value contains any currency amounts and implements CurrencyConvertible the calculation engine will automatically convert the amounts into the reporting currency.

        Parameters:
        trade - the target of the calculation
        marketData - the market data used in the calculation
        Returns:
        the result of the calculation

      • requirements

        public FunctionRequirements requirements(CdsTrade trade)
        Description copied from interface: CalculationFunction
        Returns requirements specifying the market data the function needs to perform its calculations.
        Parameters:
        trade - a target
        Returns:
        requirements specifying the market data the function needs to perform its calculations for the target

      • defaultReportingCurrency

        public Optional<Currency> defaultReportingCurrency(CdsTrade target)
        Description copied from interface: CalculationFunction
        Returns the default reporting currency for the result of performing the calculation for the target if there is a sensible default.

        This is the currency to which currency amounts are converted if the reporting rules don't specify a reporting currency. This is normally the 'natural' currency for the trade, for example the currency of a FRA or the base currency of an FX forward.

        The default implementation returns an empty optional.

        Parameters:
        target - the target of the calculation
        Returns:
        the default reporting currency for the target if there is a sensible default
